name: Lonely Cat Toy 2 - Fun Games for a cat alone
name_original: Lonely Cat Toy 2 - Fun Games for a cat alone
description:
Lonely Cat Toy 2 - For Cat Alone - is a sequel to our first game. With all new Fun and interactive games for cat owners to play with their pets. Choose the toy you would like your cat to play with and watch in awe as your kitty tries to catch or "paw" the toy as it moves around on the screen! This will keep your adult cat alone or kitten occupied for hours and it's entertaining to watch for humans too!

- 6 fun animals and objects to chase
- 6 different sound effects

Toys included: Water Drop, Yarn, Feathers, Mouse Hole, Shoe Lace and Ladybird
